SELECT COUNT(1) FROM PROJECTS
UPPER(PROJECT_NAME) LIKE UPPER('%'||#value#||'%')
UPPER(PROJECT_DESCRIPTION) LIKE UPPER('%'||#value#||'%')
UPPER(PROJECT_RECEIVER ) LIKE UPPER('%'||#value#||'%')
UPPER(PROJECT_ASSIGNER ) LIKE UPPER('%'||#value#||'%')

SELECT * FROM (SELECT page.*, ROWNUM rnum FROM (SELECT DISTINCT PROJ.PROJECT_ID AS projectId, PROJ.PROJECT_NAME AS projectName, PROJ.PROJECT_RECEIVER AS projectReceiver, PROJ.PROJECT_ASSIGNER AS projectAssigner, PROJ.PROJECT_START_DATE AS projectStartDate, PROJ.PROJECT_ESTIMATE_DATE AS projectEstimateDate, PROJ.PROJECT_DESCRIPTION AS projectDescription, PROJ.PROJECT_LAST_STATUS AS projectLastStatus, EMP_ASSIGN.EMPLOYEE_NAME AS projectAssignerName, EMP_RECEIVE.EMPLOYEE_NAME AS projectReceiverName, EMP_RECEIVE.EMPLOYEE_ID AS employeeIdReceiver FROM PROJECTS PROJ JOIN PROJECT_DETAILS PD ON PROJ.PROJECT_ID = PD.PROJECT_ID JOIN EMPLOYEES EMP_ASSIGN ON PROJ.PROJECT_ASSIGNER=EMP_ASSIGN.EMPLOYEE_ID JOIN EMPLOYEES EMP_RECEIVE ON PROJ.PROJECT_RECEIVER=EMP_RECEIVE.EMPLOYEE_ID
UPPER(PROJ.PROJECT_NAME) LIKE UPPER('%'||#value#||'%')
UPPER(PROJ.PROJECT_DESCRIPTION) LIKE UPPER('%'||#value#||'%')
UPPER(PROJ.PROJECT_RECEIVER ) LIKE UPPER('%'||#value#||'%')
UPPER(PROJ.PROJECT_ASSIGNER ) LIKE UPPER('%'||#value#||'%')
ORDER BY PROJ.PROJECT_ID ASC) page WHERE ROWNUM <= #endRow#) WHERE rnum >= #startRow#

SELECT PROJECT_ID AS projectId, PROJECT_NAME AS projectName, PROJECT_RECEIVER AS projectReceiver, PROJECT_ASSIGNER AS projectAssigner, PROJECT_START_DATE AS projectStartDate, PROJECT_ESTIMATE_DATE AS projectEstimateDate, PROJECT_LAST_STATUS AS projectLastStatus, PROJECT_DESCRIPTION AS projectDescription, EMP_ASSIGN.EMPLOYEE_NAME AS projectAssignerName, EMP_RECEIVE.EMPLOYEE_NAME AS projectReceiverName, EMP_RECEIVE.EMPLOYEE_ID AS employeeIdReceiver FROM PROJECTS PRO JOIN EMPLOYEES EMP_ASSIGN ON PRO.PROJECT_ASSIGNER = EMP_ASSIGN.EMPLOYEE_ID JOIN EMPLOYEES EMP_RECEIVE ON PRO.PROJECT_RECEIVER = EMP_RECEIVE.EMPLOYEE_ID WHERE PROJECT_ID=#id#
